topics.body:
If you're wondering why I haven't been posting as much in this thread it's cause this thread moves too fast; been only keeping up with certain threads and such.

Well since I've missed my daily, "things in the news" explanation; right now muslims are sick of ISIS and are burning ISIS flags as sort of a "we don't support you" challenge.

Also Republicans may take the senate by literally one seat; however 2015 is shaping up to be "the year non-social conservative republicans/old school republicans/libertarians drink themselves into comas due to the cringe level".

Same-sex marriage will probably be legalized in the super majority of states spring or summer cause there's a ton of states right now with appeals that will be decided sooner rather than later. Basically we're looking at close to thirty early spring.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
